attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to build a indoor skate park in filby because not many people who live near filby E.G. Fleggburgh cannot get to skateparks which are in yarmouth and Gt.Yarmouth because they don't have transport. If the skate park is outdoors it will be vandilised by teenagers who dont care for the community so if it is indoors it wont be destroyed.
